name: Speed Bump Car Crash Simulator
description:
Get ready for realistic car crashing test simulator game over 100 speed bumps of tricky racing tracks. Win the 100+ speed breaker challenge on highway fury roads by playing new bumpy road game of 2018.

For car crash test you can drive multiple vehicles like muscle cars, classic cars, monster trucks, 4x4 Prado, farmer tractor, off-road SUV's, ATV bike, formula one car and other high speed sports vehicles. Test the car crash destructible engine on challenging bumps by performing tricky stunts through deadly obstacles like crushers, ramps, destruction balls and consecutive speed bumps.

This speed bump operation is specially design for beam drive test where 100+ speed is required to cross the bumpy road without any car accidents. High speed testing can be done by fast driving the buggy and pro ATV on desert highway but don't let them go off-roads otherwise car crash will be occur and game will be over.

Features:
- Can be played offline and it is free!
- Highly challenging 99+ speed bump crash test racing levels
- Realistic crash car simulation using the next gen physics
- Multiple speed bumps depending on levels and difficulty
- Hit over speed cushions to crash bumper cars for beam break drive test
- Realistic car deformation and destruction on bumpy road disaster!
- Car crash test on consecutive +99 speed breakers like never before
- Challenging obstacle course for stuntman racers
- Multiple vehicles including vintage car, heavy duty tractor, buggy, off-road Russian truck and jeeps
